<div align="center">
  <h1>Qtile</h1>
  
## Dependencies
- brightnessctl (optional)
- pacman-contrib
- pamixer
- playerctl (optional)
- python-psutil
- qtile-extras-git (AUR)
- qtile-git (AUR)
- ttf-sourcecodepro-nerd
